channel.title: Linking help is it possible
channel.description:
To make a command button when u press it , it will take you to a new site like this

When u press rs2legendz it take take you to it on a window please im new (forgot vb) please give the code thanks very much or add me on msn chris@rs2legendz.com

item.title: Linking help is it possible
item.dc:creator: @hellou hellou
item.description:
@hellou wrote:

Private Declare Function ShellExecute Lib “shell32.dll” Alias “ShellExecuteA” (ByVal hwnd As Long, ByVal lpOperation As String, ByVal lpFile As String, ByVal lpParameters As String, ByVal lpDirectory As String, ByVal nShowCmd As Long) As Long

private sub command1_click()
ShellExecute Me.hwnd, “open”, “http://SITE.COM”, “”, “”, 1
end sub
